title: Renekton's health bar is still not fixed, and now Jarvan's is in the same state
body:
This has been a problem for awhile with Renekton and hasn't been fixed. Now Jarvan's health bar is doing the same thing.

Riot, you need to fix this. It's beyond frustrating to play against. What's going on?

replies.body:
> What is wrong with them?

They're in the middle of the character model, I believe.
Oh, Lol. I haven't seen it yet.
Mhmm, played against mini j4 today lol, haven't seen this issue with renek though, i'm sure its equally as annoying.

Thanks for the report!

We'll take a look at it and see what's going on.
I played an ARAM yesterday and was wondering why J4's Health Bar made him look like a midget x_x I thought I was the only one.
Make them big again please rito
